resources.string:
Demonstration and design application for Color Filters in the Android Framework. 

 Android Color Filters are the classes that extend android.graphics.ColorFilter: 
 • android.graphics.ColorMatrixColorFilter 
 • android.graphics.LightingColorFilter 
 • android.graphics.PorterDuffColorFilter 

 The documentation of these classes is pretty thin, and parametrization may not be trivial. There are only a few parameters to each, but the effect of them may vary highly. This application lets you try all the possibilities with a live preview of your chosen image. 

 If you're satisfied with the results and want to use it in your application it's easy to copy the code and use it with ImageView.setColorFilter. It's also possible to share the code with the original and preview image attached. 

 Any feedback is warmly welcome and will be taken into consideration.
